:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 Wireless Daul Band DOSIS 3.0 Cable Modem Router}} "16110121900-1.0 Rev1.0sp2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :24x8 DOCSIS 3.0{{CableModemSpec |down_c=24 |up_c=8 }} Web GUI: http://tplinkmodem.net ===See Also=== *[[TP-LINK Archer CR700 v1.x]] - AC1750, 16x4 DOCSIS 3.0 *[[TP-LINK Archer CR700 v2.x]] - AC1750, 16x4 DOCSIS 3.0 *[[TP-LINK Archer CR500 v1.x]] - AC1200, 16x4 DOCSIS 3.0 *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]]
